quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be great if you could attempt to go east. Following that, ensure that the box inside the chamber is open. And then, take the TextWorld limited edition keycard from the box. And then, make an attempt to head west. After that, make it so that the TextWorld limited edition chest is unlocked. Then, open the TextWorld limited edition chest within the kitchen. Then, retrieve the keycard from the TextWorld limited edition chest within the kitchen. Got that? Good!
commands: take TextWorld limited edition keycard from box
unlock TextWorld limited edition chest with TextWorld limited edition keycard
take keycard from TextWorld limited edition chest
take TextWorld limited edition keycard from box
unlock TextWorld limited edition chest with TextWorld limited edition keycard
take keycard from TextWorld limited edition chest

quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, make an attempt to venture east. Following that, ensure that the box is open. After pulling open the box, retrieve the TextWorld limited edition keycard from the box. With the TextWorld limited edition keycard, make an effort to venture west. Following that, unlock the TextWorld limited edition chest in the kitchen. And then, doublecheck that the TextWorld limited edition chest is opened. After you have pulled open the TextWorld limited edition chest, retrieve the keycard from the TextWorld limited edition chest. And then, venture east. If you can manage that, close the box in the chamber. And then, lock the box inside the chamber with the keycard. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
commands: take TextWorld limited edition keycard from box
unlock TextWorld limited edition chest with TextWorld limited edition keycard
take keycard from TextWorld limited edition chest
take TextWorld limited edition keycard from box
unlock TextWorld limited edition chest with TextWorld limited edition keycard
take keycard from TextWorld limited edition chest

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a chamber.

 You can make out a box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. It seems to be pretty normal here.

 You can see a TextWorld limited edition chest. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The TextWorld limited edition chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The TextWorld limited edition chest is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a vault. A standard kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the sauna.

 You make out a dresser. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_2]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The safe is empty![end if] You can make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest close by.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a canteen. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You are in a washroom. A typical kind of place.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a bench. The bench is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a rack. [if there is something on the s_1]On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. A typical one.

 You see a chair. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cubicle. A typical kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see a stand. [if there is something on the s_3]On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. A normal kind of place.

 You see a cabinet. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling an attic.

 You make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless chest close by.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The formless chest contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The formless chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A typical one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You see a table. [if there is something on the s_4]On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You are in a playroom. It seems to be pretty usual here. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_7]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The basket is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a salon.

 You make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchenette. A normal one.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a saucepan. [if there is something on the s_5]On the saucepan you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedroom.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bed stand you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can make out a bar. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the bar.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a recreation zone. An ordinary one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. An usual one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a launderette.

 You smell a fine smell, and follow it to a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cookhouse.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedchamber.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a type Z chest. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The type Z chest contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type Z chest is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

walkthrough: take TextWorld limited edition keycard from box
unlock TextWorld limited edition chest with TextWorld limited edition keycard
take keycard from TextWorld limited edition chest

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be a great idea if you could go to the east. And then, ensure that the box inside the chamber is open. After that, pick up the TextWorld limited edition keycard from the box in the chamber. Then, close the box within the chamber. Having closed the box, head west. With that done, unlock the TextWorld limited edition chest in the kitchen. Then, ensure that the TextWorld limited edition chest in the kitchen is open. After that, pick up the keycard from the TextWorld limited edition chest within the kitchen. Then, venture east. After that, make it so the box is locked. Alright, thanks!
